title: geth crashed with fatal error: unexpected signal during runtime execution
body:
#### System information

eth
Version: 1.4.0-unstable
Protocol Versions: [63 62 61]
Network Id: 1
Go Version: go1.5.1
OS: linux
#### Expected behaviour

Geth should work without stacktrace
#### Actual behaviour

geth exit with stacktrace
#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour

There is no specific repro steps, we created a private ethereum network of 4 nodes, and add node 
2/3/4 as node 1 peer, some nodes exit with this error almost everyday after overnight.

This is the cmd we used to start geth

geth --rpc --rpcaddr="0.0.0.0" --rpccorsdomain="*"  --maxpeers=10  --networkid 482771 --genesis ~/test/genesis.json --nodiscover --datadir ~/.hdether --verbosity=1 --rpcapi "db,eth,net,web3,personal,admin"  --minerthreads='1' --mine  > geth.log & 
#### Backtrace
